metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10102 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Before WordPress 4.9.5, the version string was not escaped in theget_the_generator function, and could lead to XSS in a generator tag.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10102` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.9.5+dfsg1-1').
